testcase.name: The static buy method returns a new remote controlled car instance
The distanceDisplay method shows 0 meters message on a new car
The distanceDisplay method shows the correct message after driving once
The batteryDisplay method shows the correct message after driving once

failure.message: org.opentest4j.AssertionFailedError: expected: "Battery at 99%" but was: "Battery at 100%"

testcase.failure: org.opentest4j.AssertionFailedError: expected: "Battery at 99%" but was: "Battery at 100%" at java.base@21.0.6/jdk.internal.reflect.DirectConstructorHandleAccessor.newInstance(DirectConstructorHandleAccessor.java:62) at java.base@21.0.6/java.lang.reflect.Constructor.newInstanceWithCaller(Constructor.java:502) at app//JedliksToyCarTest.battery_display_after_driving_once(JedliksToyCarTest.java:70) at java.base@21.0.6/java.lang.reflect.Method.invoke(Method.java:580) at java.base@21.0.6/java.util.ArrayList.forEach(ArrayList.java:1596) at java.base@21.0.6/java.util.ArrayList.forEach(ArrayList.java:1596)

testcase.name: The distanceDisplay method shows the correct message after driving and draining all battery

failure.message: org.opentest4j.AssertionFailedError: expected: "Driven 2000 meters" but was: "Driven 2020 meters"

testcase.name: The batteryDisplay method shows battery empty after draining all battery

testcase.name: The batteryDisplay method shows the correct battery percentage after driving multiple times

testcase.name: The static buy method returns each time a new remote controlled car instance
The distanceDisplay method shows the correct message after driving multiple times
The batteryDisplay method shows full battery message on a new car
